summary: Quality Assurance Lead with experience in coaching & development, technical support, process improvement, and training development and delivery for customer service teams; strong leadership, communication, and organizational skills.
skills: Able to think outside the box

experience.title: Quality Assurance Lead
experience.description: Monitored a select number of agents per hour, per day, per week; delivered feedback within an acceptable time frame; analyzed Mobility Support Departments; created Mobility Support Team quality form and Observations form; implemented a program that increased Mobility Support quality scores by 10%. Participated in weekly huddles and staff meetings to exchange ideas; actively facilitated calibrations and monitored program requirements; assisted in creating recognition programs; created a monthly quality assurance newsletter; attended CLE (Coaching Leadership Essentials) Training and Development and utilized the new coaching processes; monitored agents across multiple departments; trained management on Excel spreadsheets and reporting shortcuts; cross-trained on several contracts; contributed to the start-up of new Sprint contract; created informational development tips and a coaching tracking spreadsheet; assisted in creating Development Progress plans; managed quality communication, customer support and product representation for each client; worked under deadlines and provided back-up for others.

experience.title: Manager
experience.description: Implemented programs that increased agent quality scores by 15 percentage points; assisted in implementing a Customer Experience program achieving a sustained Net Promoter Score of 90%+. Project managed the development and implementation of a new dispatch system; developed training materials resulting in improved agent performance; implemented a customer compliment initiative improving morale; created project plans and operational procedures; developed quality materials, audit protocols and training modules; conducted client tours/presentations; managed third-party vendor relationships; supervised inbound call center staff; monitored performance, attendance, and training progress; conducted interviews for entry-level and technical support roles; maintained the call center knowledge base; led Customer Service initiatives.

experience.title: Lead Customer Service Agent
experience.description: Emergency Dispatch Agent; consistent top performer; handled customer escalations; assisted in training and development; participated in Peer-to-Peer mentoring; promoted to Quality Assurance Department within 6 months; created Culture Committee to boost morale; created Excel metrics reporting spreadsheets; monitored inbound and outbound calls; coached and developed co-workers.

experience.title: Technical Customer Service Agent
experience.description: Troubleshot setup of top boxes; resolved Mac and PC operating issues; dispatched mobile technicians to customer locations; created tracking tickets for issues; maintained a maximum handle time of 12 minutes; data entry; scheduled new cable and Fios installation.

experience.title: Senior Service Agent - Assistant Supervisor
experience.description: Quality assurance monitoring; processed customer prescription claims; verified insurance coverage; researched escalated customer disputes; mentored new hire training classes; created new standardized procedures and policies for agent accountability.

certifications: CLE Training Award for Leadership Support of the year
Annual Best Leadership Award of the year
